Today in County Sligo, Strandhill is lighting up with clean 2 ft @10s WNW swell and light 2 mph SE winds, best enjoyed from 08:54 to 16:12. Tomorrow, the swell builds to 4 ft @12s WNW with light N winds, making for a fun day at Strandhill and Easkey spots. On the day after, expect 3 ft @11s NW at Strandhill with light E winds, still offering some good rides. Best: tomorrow.
